title: Preemtive Basic Auth not possible with SolrJ 4.8
description:
In version 4.3 from org.apache.httpcomponets are major changes. That's why    the preemptive basic authentication in SolrJ 4.8 does not work anymore.

I found a solution for it. Therefore i add some code to HttpSolrServer.java.

comments.author: Shalin Shekhar Mangar
comments.content: Basic auth support has been added to Solr and Solrj.
